name: FileUpload
description: A file selection component with drag-and-drop support, file validation, and upload progress tracking

accessibility.screenReader: Dropzone announces interaction instructions. File list announces file names and sizes. Progress announced with live region.

recommendedUsage: Use for file selection with preview and validation. Supports single or multiple file uploads.
antiPatterns: Do not use for simple file inputs without preview needs. Avoid for very large file counts - consider pagination.
